channel.title: Freezing Barrage

item.title: Freezing Barrage
item.dc:creator: @holidayscape holidayscape
item.description:
@holidayscape wrote:

Ive tried adjusting things with the entangedelay but it didnt change the freezing. My Freezing public void looks like this:

public void ifFreeze(int delay2) { if(EntangleDelay == 0) { EntangleDelay = delay2; sM("You have been frozen!"); walkTo(0,0); walkTo(0,0); newWalkCmdSteps = 0; newWalkCmdX[0] = newWalkCmdY[0] = tmpNWCX[0] = tmpNWCY[0] = 0; getNextPlayerMovement(); } }
Btw im using black pearlâ€™s source. If you need any more info tell me.
